Title:

from History
Published: Proc. Intâ€™l Conf. on Automated Software Eng
UseOF-SZZ: To for map code changes to bug reports
Summary:
They present iBugs, an approach that automatically extracts benchmarks for bug localization from the history of 
    a project.
Outcome:
They demonstrate the relevance of our dataset for both static and dynamic bug
    localization tools with case studies on FINDBUGS and AMPLE .
